name: CC-OCR
description: Challenging document OCR benchmark with dense Chinese-English mixed text, layout noise, and varied typography.

metrics.name: accuracy
metrics.definition: Exact-match accuracy of recognized text spans against reference transcription

test_method: Use official evaluation scripts that normalize punctuation and spaces. Provide bounding-box ordering when formatting prompts.
notes: Document OCR-specific decoding steps (e.g., reading direction, language tags). Dataset mixes long receipts and signage.
